summary: Full-stack multi-page e-commerce website for 'Krushna Electronics' retail electronics store. Testing/learning purposes only. Node.js + Express backend, SQLite3 database, HTML/CSS/JS frontend. Dark blue, white, and neon accent theme. Includes 7 frontend pages, session/JWT auth, role-based access, and a fully protected admin panel.
architectural_notes: Stack: Node.js + Express backend, SQLite3 database, HTML/CSS/JS frontend
Auth: JWT or session-based, role-based (User/Admin); admin routes protected at backend level
Admin panel accessible only when logged-in user role = 'admin'
Product images stored locally on the server
Project is local/localhost only — not production-ready or hosting-optimized
UI: Dark blue + white + neon accents, rounded cards, soft shadows, smooth transitions, responsive (mobile/tablet/desktop)
known_issues: Home page background image contains text that interferes/overlaps with actual page text
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Clean dark navy electronics-themed hero banner background with abstract circuit board or glowing tech bokeh elements, no text or typography (hero-bg.dim_1920x700.png)

existing_features.title: Apply a consistent dark-blue, white, and neon-accent electronics-showroom visual theme across the entire frontend: dark navy/deep-blue backgrounds, crisp white text, cyan/electric-teal neon highlights, sans-serif typography, rounded product cards with soft drop-shadows, smooth hover/transition animations, and a fully responsive layout (mobile, tablet, desktop).

Implement a sticky navigation bar visible on every page that includes the Krushna Electronics logo/brand name, navigation links (Home, Shop, About, Contact), a search bar, cart icon with item count badge, wishlist icon, and Login/Register or user-account button.

Build a Home page containing: (1) a full-width hero banner showcasing latest offers with a CTA button, (2) a Featured Products section displaying 4–8 product cards, (3) a Categories section with clickable category tiles, (4) a 'Why Choose Us' section with icon-based feature highlights, (5) a Customer Reviews/Testimonials section, and (6) a footer with store contact info, social media links, and quick navigation links.

Build a Shop page with a product grid layout that supports: filtering by category and price range, sorting by price (low–high, high–low), newest, and popularity, 'Add to Cart' button on each card, and star-rating display on each card.

Build a Product Details page that displays: a product image gallery (main image + thumbnails), product title, price, and star rating, a Specifications section, stock availability status, 'Add to Cart' and 'Buy Now' buttons, and a Related Products section.

Build a Cart page listing selected products with: product image/name/price per item, a quantity selector (increment/decrement/manual input), a 'Remove' button per item, a price breakdown showing Subtotal, Tax (e.g., 18% GST), and Total, and a 'Proceed to Checkout' button.

Build a Checkout page with: a billing details form (name, email, phone), a shipping address form, simulated payment method selection (UPI, Credit/Debit Card, Cash on Delivery), and an Order Confirmation screen shown after successful order placement.
Build an About Us page with: a store introduction paragraph, Mission and Vision statements, and a 'Years of Service' or milestones highlight section.

Build a Contact page with: a contact form (name, email, subject, message) that submits to the backend, an India-based store address, a phone number, a map placeholder section, and listed business hours.

Implement Login and Register pages/modals with JWT-based authentication. Register collects name, email, and password; Login returns a JWT token stored in localStorage. The default user role is 'user'; a pre-seeded admin account has role 'admin'. Display user account info and a logout option when authenticated.

Implement a Wishlist feature for authenticated users: an 'Add to Wishlist' button on product cards and the Product Details page, a dedicated Wishlist page listing saved products, and the ability to remove items from the wishlist. Wishlist data must be persisted in the backend database per user.

Build an Admin Panel accessible only to users with role 'admin'. It must include: a Dashboard overview showing total users, total products, total orders, and total sales; a Product Management section (add, edit, delete products, update stock, and associate a product image filename); a User Management section listing all registered users; and an Order Management section listing all orders with the ability to update order status.

On the Home page hero banner, replace or modify the background image so it no longer contains visible embedded text. Either generate a clean background image without any text, or apply a strong dark overlay (e.g., semi-transparent dark navy layer at 60–75% opacity) over the existing hero background so that any embedded text in the image is fully obscured and does not interfere with the hero banner's headline, subheadline, or CTA button text.

new_feature_requests.summary: Home page with hero banner, featured products, categories, why choose us, reviews, and footer
Shop page with product grid, category/price filters, sort options, add-to-cart, and rating display
Product Details page with image gallery, specs, stock info, add-to-cart/buy-now, and related products
Cart page with quantity selector, remove option, price breakdown, and checkout button
Checkout page with billing form, shipping address, simulated payment options (UPI/Card/COD), and order confirmation
About Us page with store intro, mission/vision, and years of service
Contact page with form, India-based address, phone, map placeholder, and business hours
Login/Register functionality with role-based authentication (User/Admin) using JWT or session
Admin panel (protected by role) with product CRUD, stock update, image upload, user/order management, and basic analytics

Design and implement the Motoko backend as a single actor exposing REST-style query and update calls for: user registration and login (with hashed passwords and JWT issuance), product CRUD, category management, cart management, wishlist management, order creation and status tracking, and a contact form submission endpoint.

Seed the backend database with sample data on first run: at least 2 product categories (e.g., Smartphones, Laptops), at least 6 sample products with realistic electronics details, one admin user account (admin@krushna.com / Admin@123), and at least 2 regular user accounts.
